casebody.data:
NEWBERNE
v.
CRIME CONTROL, et al. No. 75A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 26, 2005. J. Heydt Philbeck, Raleigh, for Reginald Newberne. Donald K. Phillips, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Crime Control, et al. J. Michael McGuinness, Elizabethtown, for NC Troopers Association. Luke Largess, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers & AC. Thomas A. Harris, for State Employees Asso. of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of April 2005 by N.C. Association of County Commissioners to be allowed to participate in oral argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of April 2005."
